text.div: No narrative is provided for definitional resources. A human-readable rendering can be found in the implementation guide(s) where this resource is used.

description.value: The consistency of the feces indicates the hardness of the stool. The Bristol Stool scale is used to determine this.

purpose.value: A derived profile from [zib-BowelFunction.DefecationConsistency](http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-BowelFunction.DefecationConsistency) to provide a version better suited for implementation purposes. This profile augments the base profile with elements found in the various use cases that have adopted the zib.

comment.value: This Observation resource represents the DefecationConsistency concept (NL-CM:4.15.9) of zib BowelFunction. It can be used together with the [nl-core-BowelFunction](http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/nl-core-BowelFunction) profile on the Observation resource, which groups references to the current and other resources on `Observation.hasMember`.
